# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you for $150. It's an investment that promises to deliver long-term satisfaction and utility. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
